agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Texas Ports, Select TIME & DATE: 3:30 PM or upon adjournment Wednesday, March 27, 2019 PLACE: E1.028 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Brandon Creighton The Committee will meet to consider the following: SB 1915 Alvarado Relating to navigation districts. SB 2222 Creighton Relating to the board of pilot commissioners for Harris County ports. SB 2223 Creighton Relating to the safe and efficient provision of pilot services by the Board of Pilot Commissioners for Harris County Ports. Public testimony will be limited to 3 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please provide 10 copies to the committee clerk with your name and bill number on each copy. You may register for this hearing using the Senate kiosk located in the extension hallways, outside the committee room, or by going to http://swrs.
